title: Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk, Blonde Ash
descriptions:
Introducing the Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk in beautiful Blonde ​Ash finish! This versatile and stylish desk is perfect for both home and professional use.

Crafted from medium-density fiberboard and finished with a durable paper laminate, this desk is built to last. And with its scratch-resistant and water-spill-resistant finish, you can rest assured that it will maintain its good looks for years to come.

The desk features a total of 4 drawers, including a slide-out keyboard tray, a file drawer, and 3 additional box drawers, providing ample storage space for all your office essentials. And with its 59-inch width, there's plenty of room for all your computer equipment and accessories.

This desk meets ANSI/BIFMA Performance Standards, ensuring that it is both safe and functional. Assembly is required, but with its easy-to-follow instructions, you'll have it set up in no time. And if you need some extra help, our in-home assembly service is available by calling 866-388-4350.

Please note that due to its size and weight, this desk may require more than one person to handle. But once it's set up, you'll have a beautiful, functional workspace that will serve you well for years to come.

Order your Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk today and experience the perfect blend of style, functionality, and durability!
